title: Manage Yard Switching
description: A yardmaster needs to create a switch list to instruct a crew on how to move railcars around the yard to build an outbound train.

tasks.description: Select the outbound train that needs to be built.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the correct train consist.

tasks.description: For each railcar on the train, find its current location (track and position) in the yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system provides the current location for all needed railcars.

tasks.description: Generate an optimized switch list that details the sequence of moves (pulls and spots) required to assemble the train.
tasks.expected_outcome: An efficient work order for the switch crew is created.

tasks.description: Assign the switch list to an available yard crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is sent to the crew's mobile device.
